doc.title: Circus Porcelina
doc.plot: Circus Porcelina is a modern interpretation of the classic Little Red Riding Hood fairytale. The Young Celina suffers abuse in the sanctity of her own bedroom, the only witnesses to her Father's crimes are her childhood toys. As an adult, Celina veils herself from these painful memories. But she cannot hide forever, and when greed and vanity surface the past is suddenly thrust upon her - the fear of her father personified in the form of the Ghoulish Clown. To escape, Celina must confront the Clown and face her tortured past.
